name: Calendar
description: Provides calendar management of the working week, holidays, and other event dates. This is to support rules such as disabling a wakeup alarm on public or personal holidays.
author: Chas-IoT

workWeek.title: Working week
workWeek.description: set the days of the working week

calendarific.title: Calendarific.com
calendarific.description: DEPRECATED: connection details for API provider Calendarific.com - will be removed in a future release, kept to allow copying of apiKey

apiKey.description: enter the API key provided by Calendarific.com

location.description: the location code for the required calendar. For example 'sg' or 'us-ny'. See Calendarific.com documentation

api.title: Connection details for holiday API provider
api.description: optional connection details for the chosen API provider

key.title: API key
key.description: the API key from the provider (if needed)

country.title: Country code
country.description: the country code for the required calendar. See the provider documentation for details

region.title: State / Region / County / Locale
region.description: the sub-country code for the required calendar. See the provider documentation for details

dateList.title: Date list
dateList.description: Notes: 1) Invalid dates, such as 2020-02-31, will be stored and ignored. 2) The Date Types: 'holiday' should be self-explanatory. 'working' is for a 'reverse holiday' where a day of the week that is not usually a working day is set to working. 'event' is useful for rules processing of dates, particularly in combination with a 'Tag'.

tag.title: Tag
tag.description: an optional tag that may be useful in rules
